subsection.name: Getting the sources
subsection.p: This will create a magnolia directory and download the latest code from subversion.

subsection.name: Building
subsection.p: In order to produce a fully working war just type maven war : maven will take care of downloading all the needed libraries, compile, running tests and packaging. The generated war can be found in the target dir.
